REACTION_REMOVED: You removed your reaction from this post
REACTION_UPDATED: You changed your reaction to this post
REACTION_ALREADY_EXISTS: You already reacted to this post
REACTION_COUNT_LIMIT: Reaction limit reached for this post
NO_REACTIONS: No one has reacted to this post yet

NOTIFICATIONS.HAHA: {{username}} reacted with haha to your post
NOTIFICATIONS.WOW: {{username}} reacted with wow to your post
NOTIFICATIONS.SAD: {{username}} reacted with sad to your post
NOTIFICATIONS.ANGRY: {{username}} reacted with angry to your post
